definitions.definition: Clear enough to be read; readable , particularly of handwriting .
examples: Despite hardly having any energy to lift a pen, she left a legible note on the paper.

definitions.definition: Written or phrased so as to be easy to understand.
examples: You can make this program code more legible by using meaningful variable names.

main_definition: Clear enough to be read; readable , particularly of handwriting .
secondary_definitions: Written or phrased so as to be easy to understand.
